name: columns
description: Number of columns to display per row in the navigation section of the footer – `4`, `3`, `2` or `1`. Defaults to `4`.

name: navigation
description: The navigation section of the footer before the copyright information. Alternatively supports an array of `navigation` objects.

params.name: title
params.description: Title for group of footer navigation links.

params.name: text
params.description: Optional text to use within each navigation section column. If `html` is provided, the `text` option will be ignored.

params.name: html
params.description: Optional HTML to use within each navigation section column. If `html` is provided, the `text` option will be ignored.

params.name: width
params.description: Width of each navigation section column in the footer. You can pass any design system grid width here – for example, `"one-third"`, `"two-thirds"` or `"one-half"`. Defaults to `"one-quarter"`.

params.name: items
params.description: Contains the array of footer navigation link items for this group.

params.name: text
params.description: If `html` is set, this is not required. Text to use within each footer navigation link. If `html` is provided, the `text` option will be ignored.

params.name: html
params.description: If `text` is set, this is not required. HTML to use within each footer navigation link. If `html` is provided, the `text` option will be ignored.

params.name: attributes
params.description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the anchor in the footer meta section.

name: meta
description: The meta section of the footer after any navigation, before the copyright information.

params.name: visuallyHiddenTitle
params.description: Title for meta `items` links. Defaults to `"Support links"`.

params.name: html
params.description: HTML to add to the meta section of the footer, which will appear below any links specified using meta `items`.

params.name: text
params.description: Text to add to the meta section of the footer, which will appear below any links specified using meta `items`. If meta `html` is specified, this option is ignored.

params.name: items
params.description: Contains the array of key policy footer link items.

params.name: text
params.description: If `html` is set, this is not required. Text to use within each footer meta link. If `html` is provided, the `text` option will be ignored.

params.name: html
params.description: If `text` is set, this is not required. HTML to use within each footer meta link. If `html` is provided, the `text` option will be ignored.

params.name: attributes
params.description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the footer meta link.

name: copyright
description: The copyright information in the footer component, this defaults to `"© NHS England"`.

params.name: text
params.description: If `html` is set, this is not required. If `html` is provided, the `text` option will be ignored. If neither are provided, `"© NHS England"` is used.

params.name: html
params.description: If `text` is set, this is not required. If `html` is provided, the `text` option will be ignored. If neither are provided, `"© NHS England"` is used.

name: containerClasses
description: Classes to add to the footer container, useful if you want to make the footer fixed width.

name: classes
description: Classes to add to the footer container.

name: caller
description: Not strictly a parameter but a Nunjucks code convention. Using a `call` block enables you to call a macro with all the text inside the tag. This is helpful if you want to pass a lot of content into a macro. To use it, you will need to wrap the entire footer component in a `call` block.

name: attributes
description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the footer container.
